title: 2 plead guilty to hate crime charges after attacking trans employee at Mass. liquor store
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime The employee and her fiancé were seriously injured in the attack.
Two men were sentenced Monday after pleading guilty to hate crime charges in relation to assaulting a transgender employee and her fiancé at a Western Mass.
liquor store in 2024.

title: Police respond to pro-Palestine encampment at BU
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Demonstrators briefly occupied an area near a BU student center before dispersing on Monday night.
The Boston University campus.

Blake Nissen for The Boston Globe, File Police officers responded to the campus of Boston University Monday, dispersing a group of pro-Palestine demonstrators attempting to set up an encampment there.
